meanings.sent1: Watching scary movies desensitizes people to fear.
meanings.sent2: Repeated exposure to loud noises desensitizes the ears over time.
meanings.sent3: The constant honking of car horns desensitizes us to the sound.
meanings.sent4: The harsh reality of war desensitizes soldiers to violence.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of medicine desensitizes the taste buds quickly.

meanings.definition: Cause to be less affected by something.
meanings.sent1: Using sunscreen desensitizes the skin to sunburn.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise desensitizes the body to fatigue.
meanings.sent3: Eating spicy food desensitizes the tongue to heat.
meanings.sent4: The constant noise of the city desensitizes residents to quiet.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of perfume desensitizes the nose to other scents.
